Class TomcatServerProperties.Accesslog

java.lang.Object
org.springframework.boot.tomcat.autoconfigure.TomcatServerProperties.Accesslog
Enclosing class:
TomcatServerProperties
public static class TomcatServerProperties.Accesslog extends Object

4.0.0
